subject: CALBEAF-65: Events v1.13.4 - Ben's Correction Applied

message.summary: Thanks Ben! You're right - Express has active='true' as default on line 267.

correction.v1.13.3_mistake: Removed isActive default thinking Express doesn't apply it
correction.ben_pointed_out: Line 267: active = 'true' means isActive=true IS applied by default
